---
title: Oktoberfest 2010 - Eighties Throwback!
author: Art Steinmetz
date: 2010-11-09
---

![](/img/2010/eighties.JPG)

The fashion of every decade looks ridiculous in retrospect but you can certainly say eighties fashion was a damn sight more colorful than Grunge. And music? Who goes to a "Nineties Night?" The New Wave DJ got everybody jumping, and not just in the bouncy house. I even ditched my lederhosen for a more punk look.
